sentences.en: " Custer seems to have the backing of its members, " observed the friend.
sentences.cn: “ 寇斯特支部的人看来很齐心, " 他的朋友议论说.

sentences.en: A backing material is optionaland only needed for large openings.
sentences.cn: 在有较大开口的情形中,还需选购背衬材料.

sentences.en: But I thought I know how to get financial backing.
sentences.cn: 可是我想我知道如何去得到经济的支援.

sentences.en: I could see she was backing away from the idea.
sentences.cn: 我看得出来她不愿考虑这一意见.

sentences.en: It's mainly used in ladle backing layer and tundish backing layer.
sentences.cn: 自流浇注料还可采用机械化施工.

sentences.en: Johnson now sings backing vocals for Mica Paris.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊现在为迈卡·帕里斯伴唱。

sentences.en: Make a point of backing up your files at regular intervals.
Mirrors have a backing of quicksilver.
Mr Bach set up his own consulting business with the backing of his old boss.
sentences.cn: 在以前老板的帮助下，巴赫先生成立了自己的咨询公司。

sentences.en: Sharon also sang backing vocals for Barry Manilow.
sentences.cn: 莎伦也为巴里·马尼洛伴唱。

sentences.en: She flew to New York to try to raise some financial backing for the project.
sentences.cn: 她飞到纽约设法为这个计划募集一些资助。

sentences.en: She had toured as a backing musician for a rock star.
sentences.cn: 她曾以某摇滚歌星伴奏乐师的身分巡回演出.

sentences.en: There we saw a huge dam backing up the lake.
sentences.cn: 那儿,我们看见一座巨型拦湖大坝.

sentences.en: With a lot of people backing him up, he would naturally be giving himself airs and looking down his nose at everybody.
sentences.cn: 有人给他撑腰打气, 他自然趾高气扬,目中无人了.

words.tran_cn: 无背的；无靠背的；无后盾的
向后的；反向的；发展迟缓的
以前；向后地；来回地；上溯
后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
支持；使后退（back的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 后备存储器；存储器回填；辅助存储器；将存储备份
用垫环的焊缝；底焊焊缝；打底焊道

trans.tran_cn: 支持，支持者，背衬，<口>（独唱或独奏的）伴奏
trans.tran_en: support or help, especially with money

trans.tran_cn: （使）后退，（使）倒退( back的现在分词)，支持，作…的衬里，（用证据或理论来）证实（一种理论或主张）
